title: ralph-setup wizard with gum
description: Interactive gum-based wizard for adding projects, selecting MCPs, and migrating .env secrets to 1Password. Makes setup easy for new users.

acceptanceCriteria.text: ralph-setup command launches gum menu with options
Add new project: auto-detects path and name from cwd
Add new project: multi-select MCPs from mcpDefinitions
Add new project: detects .env and offers to scan for secrets
Manage MCPs: add new MCP definitions (name, command, args)
View registry: pretty-prints current config with gum pager
